title: Welcome the new year with these Lunar Revel sales

replies.body: Firecracker jinx is in the store for 1350 RP instead of 975 RP. Is there a glitch with the Jinx skin in store at the moment? Even though it should be on sale?
This has been fixed, apologies for the issue this morning.
:( i Bought it For 1350 Rp Yesterday Morning Do i Get A Refund On that 375 RP? {{item:3070}}

Note: All the wards and icons in the Year of the Goat, Horse, and Snake bundles are 99% off thanks to Jinx’s wanton disregard for… stuff. 
if that means that the skin wards and Summoner icons from the year of the goat, hoarse, and snake then there is a glitch in the store because all the prices are the same as normal.
in the bundles
UPVOTE!!1
Can u fix the pricing issues realised i just paid 5488 for the year of the goat bundle (i already own all champs) so it should of been with no discounts 4580 RP (1350 + 975 + 975 + 640 + 640)

Hey Flaming Moes,
This issue has been sorted, there was a glitch with the discount feature of the bundle.

You can contact player support who can assist in resolving the difference in RP price.
jeez you're rude. can't you just give him back his riot points (AKA almost 10 dollars)
Not all Riot employees work in the same departments. I don't imagine every single person that works for Riot has access to all accounts on the server. Give them a break, YOU'RE rude.
Just wondering, is the Lunar Revel Mystery Box live right now? Cos when I wanted to gift my friend nothing of that name came up, just the regular mystery gifting options. Just curious

Is there a difference between the "Lunar Revel Mystery Box" listed here and the regular mystery skin/box? Only asking because that, along with the mystery chest, has me a bit confused looking at the gift centre

Hi Riot,

What is the Lunar Revel Mystery Box called in the gifting centre? I do not see it listed as that, so before I spend 490RP, I'd like to be sure that it will trigger the Year of the Goat icon.

Cheers,
Waceded

"Note: All the wards and icons in the Year of the Goat, Horse, and Snake bundles are 99% off thanks to Jinx’s wanton disregard for… stuff." what does this even mean Riot the ward skins are all the same money 640RP and you cant buy any of the old summoner icons anyways not in the store please explain.
99% off if you get them as part of the bundles, as it says
can you buy one skin instead of buying a bundle? because all i want is DragonBlade {{champion:92}}

Has gifting been updated, I just looked through the store and it doesn't look like it has been has been. Would like to grab the icon but wanna be 100% sure before I gift.
Think we need to wait for Feb 17 for the actual discounts though.
It says the discount is through to the 17th then less of a discount until the 24th

because {{champion:16}} is a unicorn lady not a goat
If the 'Year Of The Goat Set' skins were 975 RP each it will cost 8 RP less if u buy it without the bundle. :)

sorry to bother you Riot but i bought my friend a mystery gift for lunar revel and i havent recieved my year of the goat icon and its been about 30  or so hours since i bought it. i mystery gifted him resistance Caitlyn and he mystery gifted me Aether wing kayle im not sure if he got his either please help!
I don't get money until the 20th, and was wondering if Dragonblade Riven will still be on sale for 975 RP by then?
Dragonblade riven is... 1350 RP
Okay, well will it be in the store on the 20th is what I was mainly asking.
Firecracker Jinx...i know its for the year of dragon right? because there are so many dragons...please dont fool us.
